amendment.description: To provide for the accurate and timely processing of medicare claims.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1634 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1634 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Hollings to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11323) To provide for the accurate and timely processing of medicare claims.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1634 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1634 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Hollings to Amendment SA 1542.
